item.title: SWN
item.description: score:161 Chances: Higher institutional ownership implies stock price sensitivity Higher oil production and reduction in marketing purchases aiding Q4 earnings Longer-term bull case for natural gas and potential gainers Earnings and revenue surprises, strong cash flow despite lower commodity prices Risks: Stock price sensitivity to broader macroeconomic environment Impact of fluctuating gas output and supply on stock performance Score:161 chances characters count - risks characters count = 161
